verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto<WH413> Aaron,<WH175> and say<WH559> unto<WH413> him, When thou lightest<WH5927> <WH853> the lamps,<WH5216> the seven<WH7651> lamps<WH5216> shall give light<WH215> over against<WH413> <WH4136> <WH6440> the candlestick.<WH4501>

And Aaron<WH175> did<WH6213> so;<WH3651> he lighted<WH5927> the lamps<WH5216> thereof over against<WH413> <WH4136> <WH6440> the candlestick,<WH4501> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Moses.<WH4872>

And this<WH2088> work<WH4639> of the candlestick<WH4501> was of beaten<WH4749> gold,<WH2091> unto<WH5704> the shaft<WH3409> thereof, unto<WH5704> the flowers<WH6525> thereof, was beaten work:<WH4749> according unto the pattern<WH4758> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had showed<WH7200> <WH853> Moses,<WH4872> so<WH3651> he made<WH6213> <WH853> the candlestick.<WH4501>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
Take <WH3947> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> from among<WH4480> <WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and cleanse<WH2891> them.

And thus<WH3541> shalt thou do<WH6213> unto them, to cleanse<WH2891> them: Sprinkle<WH5137> water<WH4325> of purifying<WH2403> upon<WH5921> them, and let them shave<WH5674> <WH8593> <WH5921> all<WH3605> their flesh,<WH1320> and let them wash<WH3526> their clothes,<WH899> and so make themselves clean.<WH2891>

Then let them take<WH3947> a young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock<WH6499> with his meat offering,<WH4503> even fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> and another<WH8145> young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock<WH6499> shalt thou take<WH3947> for a sin offering.<WH2403>

And thou shalt bring<WH7126> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation:<WH4150> and thou shalt gather<WH6950> <WH853> the whole<WH3605> assembly<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> together:

And thou shalt bring<WH7126> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall put<WH5564> <WH853> their hands<WH3027> upon<WH5921> the Levites: <WH3881>

And Aaron<WH175> shall offer<WH5130> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> for an offering<WH8573> of<WH4480> <WH854> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> that they may execute<WH1961> <WH5647> <WH853> the service<WH5656> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And the Levites<WH3881> shall lay<WH5564> <WH853> their hands<WH3027> upon<WH5921> the heads<WH7218> of the bullocks:<WH6499> and thou shalt offer<WH6213> <WH853> the one<WH259> for a sin offering,<WH2403> and the other<WH259> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> unto the LORD,<WH3068> to make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH5921> the Levites.<WH3881>
And thou shalt set<WH5975> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> before<WH6440> Aaron,<WH175> and before<WH6440> his sons,<WH1121> and offer<WH5130> them for an offering<WH8573> unto the LORD.<WH3068>
Thus shalt thou separate<WH914> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> from among<WH4480> <WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> and the Levites<WH3881> shall be<WH1961> mine.

And after<WH310> that<WH3651> shall the Levites<WH3881> go in<WH935> to do the service<WH5647> <WH853> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation:<WH4150> and thou shalt cleanse<WH2891> them, and offer<WH5130> them for an offering.<WH8573>

For <WH3588> they<WH1992> are wholly given<WH5414> <WH5414> unto me from among<WH4480> <WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> instead of<WH8478> such as open<WH6363> every<WH3605> womb,<WH7358> even instead of the firstborn<WH1060> of all<WH3605> the children<WH4480> <WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> have I taken<WH3947> them unto me.

For <WH3588> all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> are mine, both man<WH120> and beast:<WH929> on the day<WH3117> that I smote<WH5221> every<WH3605> firstborn<WH1060> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> I sanctified<WH6942> them for myself.
And I have taken<WH3947> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> for<WH8478> all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And I have given<WH5414> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> as a gift<WH5414> to Aaron<WH175> and to his sons<WH1121> from among<WH4480> <WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> to do<WH5647> <WH853> the service<WH5656> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> in the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and to make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH5921> the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> that there be<WH1961> no<WH3808> plague<WH5063> among the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> when the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> come nigh<WH5066> unto<WH413> the sanctuary.<WH6944>

And Moses,<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> and all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> did<WH6213> to the Levites<WH3881> according unto all<WH3605> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Moses<WH4872> concerning the Levites,<WH3881> so<WH3651> did<WH6213> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> unto them.

And the Levites<WH3881> were purified,<WH2398> and they washed<WH3526> their clothes;<WH899> and Aaron<WH175> offered<WH5130> them as an offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> the LORD;<WH3068> and Aaron<WH175> made an atonement<WH3722> for<WH5921> them to cleanse<WH2891> them.

And after<WH310> that<WH3651> went the Levites in<WH935> <WH3881> to do<WH5647> <WH853> their service<WH5656> in the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> before<WH6440> Aaron,<WH175> and before<WH6440> his sons:<WH1121> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Moses<WH4872> concerning<WH5921> the Levites,<WH3881> so<WH3651> did<WH6213> they unto them.
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

This <WH2063> is it that<WH834> belongeth unto the Levites:<WH3881> from twenty<WH6242> and five<WH2568> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward<WH4605> they shall go in<WH935> to wait upon<WH6633> <WH6635> the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150>
And from the age<WH4480> <WH1121> of fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> they shall cease waiting upon<WH7725> <WH4480> <WH6635> the service<WH5656> thereof, and shall serve<WH5647> no<WH3808> more: <WH5750>

But shall minister<WH8334> with<WH854> their brethren<WH251> in the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> to keep<WH8104> the charge,<WH4931> and shall do<WH5647> no<WH3808> service.<WH5656> Thus<WH3602> shalt thou do<WH6213> unto the Levites<WH3881> touching their charge.<WH4931>
